R1Class 20 and Class 37/5 locomotives
that conform to RA6 shall apply those
restrictions applicable to the Class
31/4

R320mph over bridge 30 (11m 38ch)
R420mph over bridge 97 (30m 50ch)
R520mph over bridge 108 (33m 14ch)
R6Double Heading prohibited except for
providing assistance and then at only
10mph over the above structures
